roleset.name: similar, related
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: This is akin to a steamed meat bun dropping into the mouth of a dog . If you want it to spit it out , it is : Difficult ! Difficult ! Difficult !
example.arg: to a steamed meat bun dropping into the mouth of a dog
